## PoiTableManager class

The `PoiTableManager` manages the list of \[\[PoiTables\]\] that can be defined in the \[\[Theme\]\] file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PoiTableManager 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(mapView)](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of PoiTableManager. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [finishedLoading](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.finishedloading.md) |  | boolean | Return <code>true</code> if the \[\[PoiTable\]\]s have finished loading. |
|  [mapView](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.mapview.md) |  | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) |  |
|  [poiTables](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.poitables.md) |  | Map&lt;string, [PoiTable](./harp-mapview.poitable.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Return the map of \[\[PoiTable\]\]s. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addTable(poiTable)](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.addtable.md) |  | Manually add a \[\[PoiTable\]\]. Normally, the \[\[PoiTables\]\]s are specified in the \[\[Theme\]\]. Ensure that the name is unique. |
|  [clear()](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.clear.md) |  | Clear the list of \[\[PoiTable\]\]s. |
|  [getPoiTable(poiTableName)](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.getpoitable.md) |  | Retrieve a \[\[PoiTable\]\] by name. |
|  [loadPoiTables(theme)](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.loadpoitables.md) |  | Load the \[\[PoiTable\]\]s that are stored in the \[\[MapView\]\]s \[\[Theme\]\]. Note that duplicate names of \[\[PoiTable\]\]s in the \[\[Theme\]\] will lead to inaccessible \[\[PoiTable\]\]s. |
